MEQA.MY

Welcome

MEQA.MY - Be BASIC but BOLD!

MEQA.MY was born in 2022, not just as a clothing brand, but as a desire to redefine modest fashion. Founded by Saidatul Hanum binti Sazali, it started small, but with a big vision: Muslim women can embrace both comfort and confidence, rocking a look that's effortlessly basic yet undeniably bold. Over the past two years, that vision has blossomed. MEQA.MY has grown rapidly, expanding its product offerings to include a wide variety of tops, bottoms, and dresses. We've launched our own hijab and kaftan collections, especially popular during the Eid season, and with our steady growth and a loyal customer base, we've positioned ourselves as a rising name in the local Muslimah fashion market. We design high-quality tops, bottoms, sets, dresses, kaftans, kurungs, abayas, and hijabs that flatter every figure. Get ready to explore your personal style and discover pieces that let your inner light shine throughâ€“ because with MEQA.MY, you can be basic, but you'll always be bold.
